1.content:
"Eureka!" said Dr. Visizen as he was carrying a gun-like piece of technology, "I have finished INVIS-100."
His colleagues and fellow researchers quickly gathered around him. "Intriguing." said Dr. Franklin, "What does it do, Dr. Visizen?"
"Its an energy refraction activation device." said Dr. Visizen, "It utilizes the recently discovered Invisium to fire a concentrated dose of it at an object to cause the object to refration energy, primarily light, around it. To put it in layman's terms, it is an invisibility ray."
"Quite Outstanding sir but how do you know it works?" asked Dr. Franklin.
"Here, " said Dr. Visizen as he beckoned for his assistant, Alice. "My assistant, Ms. Gibson, will help demonstrate."
Alice walked in clad in a white lab coat, blouse and a professional-looking skirt and pushed a cart with an apple on it.
Alice stopped in the middle of the room and continued to stand right next to the apple. Behind her, was an open window to the college campus.
Dr. Visizen aimed down the sights. He jokingly aimed at his assistant's coat and fired. The recoil was rather large and another shot went through the window.
As the shot hit Alice, a puff of white smoke appeared. However, after the smoke cleared, she discovered the apple was still there but her clothes were not. She was standing stark naked in a crowd of her peers. There were two simultaneous screams though Alice's was more noticeable. She immediately covered herself and stormed to the changing rooms. A few colleagues were walking to the break room to get some coffee and spotted her.
"Oops." said Dr. Visizen, "It seems I have sent the penetration a little too high. Anyhow, do not worry about her. Invisium is harmless to humans and the invisibility effect should wear off in about 12-20 hours.Now I make further adjustments to it."
Dr. Visizen returned to his private lab to continue work on the ray.

Dr. Visizen rolled his eyes and then looked to his colleague. "Yes, Barry? What is your concern?"

Dr. Franklin returned his gaze. "I guess I'll go along with this... study. But what about your assistant, Alice? I'm not sure others on campus interest in her will be as... high-minded as ours."

info.description:
Invisibility is a unique idea in science fiction ENF stories. Dr. Visizen has discovered Invisium, a chemical that an turn an object invisible for a set amount of time. He has concentrated the compound into an invisibility ray. The girls are soon to be subject to the effects of this ray in embarrassing ways.

Girls:
Alice: the alluring scientist assistant dedicated to finding the unknown through science. She is blond with large breasts and a slender behind. She often hides her assets beneath conservative lab coat
Sasha: an innocent jogging passerby that gets zapped by the invisibility ray. How does she get embarrassed by it?
Chloe: The mischievous teenage daughter of Dr. Visizen, renown inventor and discoverer of Invisium. She isn't very developed yet with a B-cup breasts and a small She borrows the invisibility ray for her own personal pranks. Behold how the plan backfires
Gina: Government Agent that attempts to steal the invisibility ray but gets zapped by it instead. Far away from home and without her federal backup, how does save herself?
